snippet.title: C64 Longplay: Coalminer
snippet.description:
It's a good effort from the guys who made Clystron, The Power, and Mega Starforce. 

You have to be VERY fast in this one. A Boulder Dash clone that has something the original game never had: some cool music. 

At first the in-game graphics look a bit jumbled until you get used to it. You are the green man with the cap running around collecting the items, which vary from level to level. 

There are 25 levels and I was able to beat all but the last, in spite of constant reloading of save states. FUCKING IMPOSSIBLE. You cannot beat THE STUPID IDIOT TIGHT-ARSE FUCKTARD BASTARD TIMER! ARRRGGGH!

I did most of it so I'm sort of glad. You can see the intros and end sequence elsewhere on YouTube, anyway.
